data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Name something that your school has that you think all schools should have for students. How has it improved your time at school? How would your day be different if your school took this away?
data.answer: When it comes to a thing that my school has and I think all school should have for students, I would say it is the recess. The recess in my school that I would like to introduce to every other school is not the regular recess in between each two classes. It is a 20-minute short break scheduled at 11 o'clock, in middle of the 4 classes in the morning. During the recess, a snack will be dispensed to each student in front of the canteen. It can be a muffin, a small bottle of flavoured milk, a sausage roll, etc, varying throughout the week. The recess reduces the likelihood of students starving before their lunch at 1 o'clock. Also, it reduces stress levels and allows students to feel more relaxed. If the recess is taken away, I will probably be starving from 11 to 1 and have less chance to experience fresh air and sunshine which are both noted for increasing overall health and mood, and hence i will lose the ability to concentrate on class.
